title: 1.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Log into Scratch. On the search bar, type Make Music and press the Enter key on the keyboard.?

You will see a list of projects.Click on any one project. Read the instructions and try out the project.
Write the name of the project you opened. Describe it.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
